name: A walk in the past
description:
This game attempts to tell the tragic story of a young woman with DID. In this advernture she will return to her childhood home to learn about the traumatic events that lead to her developing DID.

IMPORTANT: Due to unfortunate events the last memory sequence and the outtro sequence is not triggered in the jam-submission. To get the full experience you can download the pathed version here: A walk in the past (updated) by Szlobi (itch.io)
